page.title: 16EMMANUAL CHURCH SHELLEY
page.content: The church was dedicated in September of 1868. It is now 117 years old. In the tower there are six bells all in current use. Unfortunately the church has no choir as the congregation averages twenty or thirty. The vicar of the church has now been vicar for over a year. Altogether there have been sixteen vicars at Shelley church. The vicar who has stayed the longest was there about nineteen years. In the church there used to be a pipe organ but then in 1968 it was changed to an electric model. The church has eight stained glass windows, two are modern and the other six are old.
